key.name: auto-rotate
key.description: When enabled, this will cause the daemon to automatically change the wallpaper whenever the current profile is changed.
key.summary: Auto rotate wallpaper when the profile is changed

key.name: current-profile
key.description: This is the current profile that the daemon will load.

key.name: icon-preview
key.description: If this is enabled and the daemon is running, the icon of the extension will change to a small preview of the next wallpaper to be displayed.
key.summary: Show preview of next wallpaper for extension icon

key.name: interval
key.description: The interval is the amount of time in seconds between the daemon switching the wallpaper.

key.name: next-wallpaper
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the next wallpaper.

key.name: notifications
key.description: Display a notification each time an event happens with desk-changer.

key.name: prev-wallpaper
key.description: Keyboard shortcut to cause the daemon to display the previous wallpaper.

key.name: profiles
key.description: These are the profiles available to the daemon.

key.name: random
key.description: If set to true the daemon will randomize the order in which the wallpapers are displayed

key.name: timer-enabled
key.description: The timer controls the automatic switching of wallpapers. If it is enabled, it will use the interval to switch the wallpaper automatically.
